title: Introducing South Africa
creator_credit: South Africa Tourist Film, J Anderson, Duncan Spence and Sven Persson
brief_description: Shows the tourist attractions of South Africe including Cape Town, Table Mountain, Johannesburg, game reserves such as Kruger National Park and much more.
